Description: Looking for waitress position for new Italian restaurant in St Regis Saadiyat to start immediatelySalary and benefits to be discuss during the interview Previous experience in the United Arab Emirates is requiredReady to join immediatelysalary starting from 3000 aed plus transportation visa provided by the company 1 flight ticket to home country one per year only people ready to join immediately and with experience in UAE ll be contactedSkills
Skills:
Provide outstanding service to ensure guest satisfaction
Take guest orders and deliver food and beverages
Offer menu suggestions, answer queries, and provide additional information to guests
Welcome and guide guests to their tables
Present the menu and offer detailed information when requested (e.g., regarding portions, ingredients, or potential allergens)
Set tables with linens, silverware, and glasses as required
Share daily specials with guests
Suggest menu items upon request
Promote additional items when appropriate
Serve food and beverage orders
Inspect dishes and kitchenware for cleanliness and presentation, reporting any concerns
Organize table settings and ensure the dining area remains clean
Present bills and process payments
